plot: From the early 1970s gay rights movement to Dr. Gertrude Glossip and her delightfully informative gay history walks, we see a man of many facets who stands up for what he believes in.
title: SA Gay: Blatant Is Beautiful
plot_es: From the early 1970s gay rights movement to Dr. Gertrude Glossip and her delightfully informative gay history walks, we see a man of many facets who stands up for what he believes in.
plot_en: From the early 1970s gay rights movement to Dr. Gertrude Glossip and her delightfully informative gay history walks, we see a man of many facets who stands up for what he believes in.
